attributes.action: Help to end Child Homelessness in the UK by 2020
attributes.background:
120,000 Children are homeless in the UK.
We live in one of the richest countries in the world and no child in our society should have to live without a safe place to stay.
Our aim is to make sure every child in the UK has a place to live in safety and peace for the duration of their childhood.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to tackle child homelessness.
